Results text
```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
source(here::here("code/table_script.R"))

# List of tables
tables_list <- list(
  list(data = results15_00, N2 = 15, gamma = 0.0),
  list(data = results15_04, N2 = 15, gamma = 0.4),
  list(data = results30_00, N2 = 30, gamma = 0.0),
  list(data = results30_04, N2 = 30, gamma = 0.4),
  list(data = results60_00, N2 = 60, gamma = 0.0),
  list(data = results60_04, N2 = 60, gamma = 0.4)
)

for(tbl in tables_list){
  label_name <- paste0("tab:N", tbl$N2, "_gamma", gsub("\\.", "", tbl$gamma))
  tbl$data %>%
    kable(
      format = "latex",
      caption = paste0("Simulation results (N2 = ", tbl$N2, 
                       ", $\\gamma_{01}$ = ", tbl$gamma, ")"),
      escape = FALSE,
      booktabs = TRUE,
      digits = 3,
      label = label_name,
      col.names = c("", rep(c("Bias","Cov","SD"), times = 5))
    ) %>%
    add_header_above(c(
      " " = 1,
      "CD" = 3, "LD" = 3, "MI-R" = 3, "MI-a" = 3, "Bayes" = 3
    )) %>%
    pack_rows(index = c("MCAR" = 4, "MAR" = 4), latex_align = "c") %>%
    pack_rows(index = c("ICC = 0.1" = 2, "ICC = 0.3" = 2, 
                        "ICC = 0.1" = 2, "ICC = 0.3" = 2)) %>%
    kable_styling(full_width = FALSE, position = "center") %>%
    landscape() %>%
    print()
}
```
